item.title: 🦜🚀Towards LangChain 0.1: LangChain-Core and LangChain-Community TL;DR: We've split the old langchain package into three separate packages to imp...
item.description:
🦜🚀Towards LangChain 0.1: LangChain-Core and LangChain-Community

TL;DR:

We've split the old langchain package into three separate packages to improve developer experience

🎯`langchain-core` contains simple, core abstractions that have emerged as a standard, as well as… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1734641665556857148
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Didier Lopes: OpenBB Copilot (built with @LangChainAI) with access to the @openbb_finance platform It still amazes me that just 1 year after ChatGP...
item.description:
RT Didier Lopes
OpenBB Copilot (built with @LangChainAI) with access to the @openbb_finance platform

It still amazes me that just 1 year after ChatGPT, we can build an agent that can perform such a complex workflow flawlessly.

OpenBB Terminal Pro is the future.

item.title: RT Eric Ciarla: Many enterprises want a single interface to access multiple http://Mendable.ai projects (Unique Model + data combinations). We just re...
item.description:
RT Eric Ciarla
Many enterprises want a single interface to access multiple http://Mendable.ai projects (Unique Model + data combinations).

We just released our Router Alpha which uses @LangChainAI function calling to dynamically route queries.

Here is what we learned so far. (1/5)
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Logan Anderson: Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool...
item.description:
RT Logan Anderson
Using @LangChainAI agents and @vercel 's AI package, I built a chat bot that queries a knowledge base and streams results with tool outputs. The tools respond with MDX components that are then streamed to a frontend MDX renderer.

Check out the video!

#AI #Chatbot
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: RAG App Slow & Costly? Smarter LLM Chunking With @LangChainAI by Clément ROBIN fixes that! He uses LangChain for an innovative new s...
item.description:
RT Roger Taylor
RAG App Slow & Costly? Smarter LLM Chunking With @LangChainAI by Clément ROBIN fixes that!

He uses LangChain for an innovative new strategy that intelligently summarizes docs with LLM first, then chunks into coherent bits for better context. Read more! 🚀 https://buff.ly/4858exu
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🚀Deploying Mistral-7B RAG to Production Join our friends at @AIMakerspace to learn how to go from prototype to production with LangServe and Mistra...
item.description:
🚀Deploying Mistral-7B RAG to Production

Join our friends at @AIMakerspace to learn how to go from prototype to production with LangServe and Mistral 7B!

Will cover LCEL, HuggingFace, LangServe, LangSmith

This Thursday, 10am PST

Link: https://lu.ma/Mistral7BRAG
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT 👨‍🏫🤖 Greg Loughnane: Re @LangChainAI + @MistralAI = the #LLMOps you need! Join us this week!
item.description:
RT 👨‍🏫🤖 Greg Loughnane
Re @LangChainAI + @MistralAI = the #LLMOps you need!

Join us this week!


AI Makerspace: Join us live to learn how to go from prototype to production with LangServe and Mistral 7B!

📦 Learn how to easily deploy @LangChainAI prototypes and leverage top embeddings from @huggingface. Discover LangServe's power in simplifying deployment.

RSVP: https://lu.ma/Mistral7BRAG
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: Analyzing RAG Methods: Semantic Similarity vs. Full Document Prompting. Ingrid Stevens uses @LangchainAI to compare traditional #RAG ...
item.description:
RT Roger Taylor
Analyzing RAG Methods: Semantic Similarity vs. Full Document Prompting.
Ingrid Stevens uses @LangchainAI to compare traditional #RAG using embeddings/vector stores to alternative "prompt stuffing" directly inputting full transcription, code link inside👉 https://buff.ly/3RAyIBc

item.title: RT Waseem: Your choice of embedding model significantly impacts the quality of retrieval for your RAG app @LangChainAI http://chat.langchain.com - is ...
item.description:
RT Waseem
Your choice of embedding model significantly impacts the quality of retrieval for your RAG app

@LangChainAI http://chat.langchain.com - is one of the most helpful RAG apps I've used

Going through the source code you see they are using @Voyage_AI_ by @tengyuma to embed their docs
item.author: LangChain
